tool.name: Step1B
tool.displayname: 1b. Intersect coastal land-based activities with Coastal Watersheds

param.name: inputWorkspace
param.dialogReference:
Input workspace: The geodatabase or feature dataset that will contain all the land input data for the Cumulative Impact Analysis.

In the sample data, the input workspace is located here: "DFO_CI_Toolbox\CI_Land_Inputs.gdb\inputs".

param.name: outputWorkspace
param.dialogReference:
Output workspace: The geodatabase or feature dataset that will contain all the processed land input data for the Cumulative Impact Analysis.

In the sample data, the input workspace is located here: "DFO_CI_Toolbox\CI_Coastal_Inputs.gdb\inputs".

param.name: inputFC
param.dialogReference: Input feature class: A land-based activity feature class that has been run through Step 3. of the Data Preparation toolbox. The dropdown menu pulls the relevant feature classes from the input workspace. Note: Only "cst" feature classes can be run through Step 1b.

param.name: watersheds
param.dialogReference:
Coastal Watersheds: Select the feature class containing the coastal watersheds (watersheds adjacent to ocean of stream order 6 or lower).

In the sample data, the coastal watersheds are: "DFO_CI_Toolbox\CI_InputData.gdb\baselayers\Coast_Watersheds".

tool.summary:
Step 1b is used to process coastal land-based activity data that falls within coastal watersheds of stream order less than 7. The Cumulative Impact Mapping analysis will model the impact of these land-based activities within a specified impact distance from the coastline.

The tool will intersect the activity data with the coastal watersheds and the output feature classes, named with user-specified scenario and activity codes will be saved in the Output Workspace: "CI_Coastal_Inputs.gdb\inputs" to be run through the Coastal Kernel Density toolbox.

idCitation.resTitle: 1b. Intersect coastal land-based activities with Coastal Watersheds
